roles.title: Software Engineer : financial systems
roles.stack: Git, Python, Django, React, GCP, Bigquery, JS, SQL, , Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes

roles.title: Senior Data Analyst : General Ledger
roles.description: Responsible for the maintenance of the General Ledger data pipeline. In charge of the reconciliation process between the General Ledger and the sub-ledgers. Developed operational dashboards on manual journal entry data quality. I have lead automation projects for our daily operations and succesfully deployed them to across teams in the US/Poland.
roles.stack: Git, AWS, VBA, Python, Docker, SQL, Tableau

roles.title: Junior FP&A Analyst
roles.description: Performed on a monthly basis: Cost follow up analysis,  material performance analysis, stock analysis, inventory analysis,item. Designed Dashboards on Tableau for nteractive monitoring on raw material productivity. Created automations on VBA and Python on my processes.  e.g Scheduled data extraction from SAP ERP on a daily basis. Created macros to update excel files automatically. Limited human errors and saved up to 2h daily.
roles.stack: Git, Python, VBA, Excel, Tableau, SAP ERP

roles.title: Intern : Internal Audit, CAFE
roles.description: Instership in the Internal Audit department of PSA group ( now Stellantis). Participated on CAFE (Corporate Average Fuel Economy) audit and co-lead investigations and documentions accross european plants.
